pullRequest.title: Don't promote transitive dependencies in shaded hazelcast-all
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #17873
Fixes hazelcast/hazelcast-enterprise#3857
EE side PR: hazelcast/hazelcast-enterprise#3858
This PR fixes the Hazelcast zero transitive dependency policy violations. The PR also adds regression tests to verify that no unexpected compile scoped dependencies are deployed.
If developers need to run the new dependency verification tests alone, they may do the following:
mvn clean install -DskipTests
mvn failsafe:integration-test -Dit.test=DependencyReducedPom* -DfailIfNoTests=false

commit.message: Fix violations from zero-dependency policy and add regression tests.

afterCommit.message: Fix violations from zero-dependency policy and add regression tests.
